_sText:
First attempt on making a map.

Story:

The Terrorists are transporting/selling guns, bombs, and private information from an abandoned factory for many dangerous groups and criminal organizations.
The FBI managed to track them down to the exact location of the HQ, the terrorist mission now is to blow up the building in order to cover their tracks.

---
You (as the Counter Terrorist) must:

Invade the building through the main gate or the side door leading to site B.
Stop the Terrorists from destroying the factory with all the evidences of their crimes and information of their clients.

---
You (as the Terrorist) must:

Plant the C4 at A to destroy all computers with useful information to slow down future tracking.
Plant the C4 at B to destroy stolen bombs, killing FBI agents in the process.Â 

How to contact me:

markhawkcwb@gmail.com or Mark Hawk#1036
I will read any feedback given.
Forgive me for my bad English, it isn't my first language.
